content.rendered:
Digiperform has been in news during the full month of Mar 2018 and sparkled in many newspapers/publications. Here, we give the glimpse of all the happenings where Digiperform has appeared in the prominent newspapers and magazines.
  1. Tips to help your Business Grow and Compete and Bigger Players using Social Media – Entrepreneur India

One of the prominent publications- Entrepreneur India has featured Digiperform in byline article on “Tips to help your Business Grow and Compete with Bigger Players using Social Media‘, highlighting the tips for SME/Startups to grow and enhance their businesses, dated 9th March 2018 in its online edition.

The publication has carried Vaibhav Vats, Digiperform’s Co-Founder article under the headline section “Tips to help your Business Grow and Compete with Bigger Players using Social Media”.

Article Focuses on “Tips to your Business Grow” and includes:
  1. Choosing a right Social Media Strategy
  2. Building a Community
  3. Measures of being Consistent and Patient
  4. Paid Marketing
Coverage Details: Publication-  Entrepreneur India Edition- Online Date- March 9th, 2018 Link- https://www.entrepreneur.com/article/310215 2) Small can be big – The Pioneer

One of the prominent publications- The Pioneer has featured Digiperform in the bylined article- ‘Tips to help your business grow and compete with bigger players using social media’ in the weekly career & education supplement of the publication called ‘Avenues’ dedicated to education, career, and HR sector, on 14th March in its print and online edition. 

The publication has carried Vaibhav Vats, Digiperform’s Co-Founder article under the headline section “Small can be big”. Article Focuses on “Tips to help your business grow and compete with bigger players using social media” and includes:
  1. The Right Network
  2. Building a Community
  3. Measures of being Consistent and Patient
  4. Paid Marketing
Coverage Details: Publication-  The Pioneer Edition- Print &Online Page- 14 Date- March 9th, 2018 Link- http://www.dailypioneer.com/avenues/small-can-be-big.html 3) Tips to make a successful career in Digital Marketing – Business World

Digiperform has appeared in one of the prominent business magazines- Business World, on March 17th. The online edition of the magazine has featured the article on ‘Tips to make a successful career in Digital Marketing’, highlighting the tips to make a successful career in Digital Marketing.

The publication has carried Vaibhav Vats, Digiperform’s Co-Founder article under the headline section “Tips to make a successful career in Digital Marketing”. Article Focuses on “Tips to help your business grow and compete with bigger players using social media” and includes:
  1. Learn and understand the basic concepts of digital marketing
  2. Finding the specialization of your choice
  3. Work on your personal brand
  4. Keep a finger on the pulse of the latest digital marketing trends
Coverage Details: Publication- Business World Edition- Online Date- March 17th, 2018 Link- http://businessworld.in/article/Tips-To-Make-A-Successful-Career-In-Digital-Marketing-/17-03-2018-143649/ 4) Tips to build and grow small businesses using social media – Republic TV

Digiperform has appeared in one of the prominent news platform- Republic TV, on 19th March 2018. The online edition of the prominent English channel has featured the article on ‘ Tips to build and grow small businesses using social media’, highlighting the tips to establish and grow businesses via social media.

About Republic TV:

Republic TV is an Indian English-language news television channel, founded by created by former Times Now Editor-in-Chief Arnab Goswami, it was launched on 6 May 2017. Republic TV became the most-watched English news channel in India in its first week of airing with 2.11 million impressions and accounted for 51.9 percent viewership as per data released for the week by the Broadcast Audience Research Council.

Article Focuses on “Tips to build and grow small businesses using social media” and includes:
  1. The Right Network
  2. Building a Community
  3. Measures of being Consistent and Patient
  4. Paid Marketing
Coverage Details: Publication- Republic TV Edition- Online Date- March 19th, 2018 Link- http://www.republicworld.com/business-news/india-business/tips-to-help-your-business-grow-using-social-media 5) Where to start with Digital Marketing? – Education Times

One of the most widely read publications- The Times of India has featured Digiperform in its weekly education supplement-Education Times, today in its print edition.

The publication has carried Vaibhav Vats, Digiperform’s Co-Founder article under the headline section ‘Where to start with Digital Marketing’
Article Focuses on “Tips to make a successful career in Digital Marketing” and includes:
  1. Learning Basics
  2. Need For Specialization
  3. Personal Branding
  4. Staying Updates
  5. Building Relationship
  6. Getting Started
Coverage Details: Publication-  Education Times-The Times of India Page- 01, Half page coverage appeared on page 01 of the education supplement nationally. Edition- National (Ahmedabad, Aurangabad, Bangalore, Bhopal, Bhubaneswar, Calicut, Chandigarh, Chennai, Coimbatore, Delhi, Guwahati, Hubli, Hyderabad, Indore, Jaipur, Kochi, Kolhapur, Kolkata, Lucknow, Madurai, Mangalore, Mysore, Nagpur, Nashik, Panaji, Patna, Puducherry, Pune, Raipur, Ranchi, Surat, Trichy, Trivandrum, Varanasi, Vijayawada and Visakhapatnam) Date: 26th March, 2018
6) It’s Important To Think Yourself As A Product – Mail Today
One of the most widely read publications- Mail Today has featured Digiperform in its exclusive Q & A which appeared in the special section “On The Spot”, that appears on every Tuesday and features interviews with CEO’s, HR/Career experts and HR Heads of renowned organizations in Education Mail, today in its print edition.
The publication has carried Manu Jolly, Digiperform’s Co-Founder article under the headline section “It’s Important To Think Yourself As A Product”.
Article Focuses on “The importance of domain knowledge and social media while hiring candidates” and includes:
  1. Key Employee Attributes for Hiring
  2. Skilled Based Hiring
  3. Common Issues while hiring graduates
  4. Domain Knowledge
  5. Working Life after College
  6. Role of Social Media
  7. Increase your Value
  8. Professional Level Mistakes
  9. Women Career Goals
Coverage Details: Publication-  Mail Today (Education Mail) Page- 21 (Print Edition). Edition- Delhi
7) Trading Trick For Online Promotions – The Tribune
One of the prominent publications- The Tribune has featured Digiperform in byline article on “Tips to make a successful career in Digital Marketing” in the weekly HR and career supplement of the publication-Jobs & Career, today in its print & online edition.

The publication has carried Vaibhav Vats, Digiperform’s Co-Founder article under the headline section “Trading Trick For Online Promotions”.

Article Focuses on “Tips to make a successful career in Digital Marketing” and includes:
  1. Learning Basics
  2. Need For Specialization
  3. Personal Branding
  4. Staying Updates
  5. Building Relationship
  6. Know Latest Trends
Coverage Details: Publication-  The Tribune (Jobs & Career) – Print & Online Edition Page- 03 Date: March 28th, 2018 Edition- Delhi, Chandigarh, Jalandhar, Dehradun, Bhatinda Online Link- http://www.tribuneindia.com/news/jobs-careers/trading-tricks-of-online-promotions/564557.html
